verses.text_uthmani: طه

translations.text: Ṭâ-Hâ.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ta-ha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِتَشْقَىٰٓ

translations.text: We have not revealed the Quran to you ˹O Prophet˺ to cause you distress,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma anzalna AAalayka alqur-analitashqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا تَذْكِرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰ

translations.text: but as a reminder to those in awe ˹of Allah˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa tathkiratan liman yakhsha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: تَنزِيلًا مِّمَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلْأَرْضَ وَٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلْعُلَى

translations.text: ˹It is˺ a revelation from the One Who created the earth and the high heavens—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tanzeelan mimman khalaqa al-arda wassamawatialAAula
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱسْتَوَىٰ

translations.text: the Most Compassionate, ˹Who is˺ established on the Throne.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Arrahmanu AAalaalAAarshi istawa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَمَا تَحْتَ ٱلثَّرَىٰ

translations.text: To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth and whatever is in between and whatever is underground.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Lahu ma fee assamawatiwama fee al-ardi wama baynahuma wamatahta aththara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِن تَجْهَرْ بِٱلْقَوْلِ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ وَأَخْفَى

translations.text: Whether you speak openly ˹or not˺, He certainly knows what is secret and what is even more hidden.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-in tajhar bilqawli fa-innahuyaAAlamu assirra waakhfa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ لَهُ ٱلْأَسْمَآءُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ

translations.text: Allah—there is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. He has the Most Beautiful Names.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allahu la ilaha illahuwa lahu al-asmao alhusna
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَهَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ

translations.text: Has the story of Moses reached you ˹O Prophet˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahal ataka hadeethu moosa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ رَءَا نَارًا فَقَالَ لِأَهْلِهِ ٱمْكُثُوٓا۟ إِنِّىٓ ءَانَسْتُ نَارًا لَّعَلِّىٓ ءَاتِيكُم مِّنْهَا بِقَبَسٍ أَوْ أَجِدُ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ هُدًى

translations.text: When he saw a fire, he said to his family, “Wait here, ˹for˺ I have spotted a fire. Perhaps I can bring you a torch from it, or find some guidance at the fire.”<sup foot_note=76929>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith raa naran faqalali-ahlihi omkuthoo innee anastu naran laAAallee ateekumminha biqabasin aw ajidu AAala annarihuda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّآ أَتَىٰهَا نُودِىَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ

translations.text: But when he approached it, he was called, “O Moses!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma ataha noodiya yamoosa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنِّىٓ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكَ فَٱخْلَعْ نَعْلَيْكَ ۖ إِنَّكَ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

translations.text: It is truly I. I am your Lord! So take off your sandals, for you are in the sacred valley of Ṭuwa.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innee ana rabbuka fakhlaAAnaAAlayka innaka bilwadi almuqaddasi tuwa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَا ٱخْتَرْتُكَ فَٱسْتَمِعْ لِمَا يُوحَىٰٓ

translations.text: I have chosen you, so listen to what is revealed:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waana ikhtartuka fastamiAAlima yooha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّنِىٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعْبُدْنِى وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِذِكْرِىٓ

translations.text: ‘It is truly I. I am Allah! There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Me. So worship Me ˹alone˺, and establish prayer for My remembrance.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innanee ana Allahu lailaha illa ana faAAbudnee waaqimi assalatalithikree
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٌ أَكَادُ أُخْفِيهَا لِتُجْزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا تَسْعَىٰ

translations.text: The Hour is sure to come. My Will is to keep it hidden, so that every soul may be rewarded according to their efforts.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna assaAAata atiyatunakadu okhfeeha litujza kullu nafsin bimatasAAa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكَ عَنْهَا مَن لَّا يُؤْمِنُ بِهَا وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ فَتَرْدَىٰ

translations.text: So do not let those who disbelieve in it and follow their desires distract you from it, or you will be doomed.’”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fala yasuddannaka AAanhaman la yu/minu biha wattabaAAa hawahufatarda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا تِلْكَ بِيَمِينِكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ

translations.text: ˹Allah added,˺ “And what is that in your right hand, O  Moses?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama tilka biyameenika ya moosa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ هِىَ عَصَاىَ أَتَوَكَّؤُا۟ عَلَيْهَا وَأَهُشُّ بِهَا عَلَىٰ غَنَمِى وَلِىَ فِيهَا مَـَٔارِبُ أُخْرَىٰ

translations.text: He replied, “It is my staff! I lean on it, and with it I beat down ˹branches˺ for my sheep, and have other uses for it.”<sup foot_note=76930>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala hiya AAasaya atawakkaoAAalayha waahushshu biha AAala ghanameewaliya feeha maaribu okhra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ أَلْقِهَا يَـٰمُوسَىٰ

translations.text: Allah said, “Throw it down, O  Moses!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala alqiha ya moosa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَلْقَىٰهَا فَإِذَا هِىَ حَيَّةٌ تَسْعَىٰ

translations.text: So he did, then—behold!—it became a serpent, slithering.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faalqaha fa-itha hiya hayyatuntasAAa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ خُذْهَا وَلَا تَخَفْ ۖ سَنُعِيدُهَا سِيرَتَهَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ

translations.text: Allah said, “Take it, and have no fear. We will return it to its former state.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala khuthha walatakhaf sanuAAeeduha seerataha al-oola
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱضْمُمْ يَدَكَ إِلَىٰ جَنَاحِكَ تَخْرُجْ بَيْضَآءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ سُوٓءٍ ءَايَةً أُخْرَىٰ

translations.text: And put your hand under your armpit, it will come out ˹shining˺ white, unblemished,<sup foot_note=76931>1</sup> as another sign,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wadmum yadaka ila janahikatakhruj baydaa min ghayri soo-in ayatan okhra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لِنُرِيَكَ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا ٱلْكُبْرَى

translations.text: so that We may show you some of Our greatest signs.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Linuriyaka min ayatinaalkubra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ

translations.text: Go to Pharaoh, for he has truly transgressed ˹all bounds˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ithhab ila firAAawna innahu tagha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱشْرَحْ لِى صَدْرِى

translations.text: Moses prayed, “My Lord! Uplift my heart for me,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbi ishrah lee sadree
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَسِّرْ لِىٓ أَمْرِى

translations.text: and make my task easy,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayassir lee amree
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱحْلُلْ عُقْدَةً مِّن لِّسَانِى

translations.text: and remove the impediment from my tongue
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahlul AAuqdatan min lisanee
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَفْقَهُوا۟ قَوْلِى

translations.text: so people may understand my speech,<sup foot_note=76932>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yafqahoo qawlee
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱجْعَل لِّى وَزِيرًا مِّنْ أَهْلِى

translations.text: and grant me a helper from my family,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajAAal lee wazeeran min ahlee
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰرُونَ أَخِى

translations.text: Aaron, my brother.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Haroona akhee
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱشْدُدْ بِهِۦٓ أَزْرِى

translations.text: Strengthen me through him,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Oshdud bihi azree
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَشْرِكْهُ فِىٓ أَمْرِى

translations.text: and let him share my task,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waashrik-hu fee amree
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَىْ نُسَبِّحَكَ كَثِيرًا

translations.text: so that we may glorify You much
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kay nusabbihaka katheera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَذْكُرَكَ كَثِيرًا

translations.text: and remember You much,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanathkuraka katheera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّكَ كُنتَ بِنَا بَصِيرًا

translations.text: for truly You have ˹always˺ been overseeing us.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innaka kunta bina baseera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ قَدْ أُوتِيتَ سُؤْلَكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ

translations.text: Allah responded, “All that you requested has been granted, O  Moses!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala qad ooteeta su/laka yamoosa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَيْكَ مَرَّةً أُخْرَىٰٓ

translations.text: And surely We had shown you favour before,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad mananna AAalayka marratanokhra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ

translations.text: when We inspired your mother with this:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith awhayna ilaommika ma yooha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَنِ ٱقْذِفِيهِ فِى ٱلتَّابُوتِ فَٱقْذِفِيهِ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ فَلْيُلْقِهِ ٱلْيَمُّ بِٱلسَّاحِلِ يَأْخُذْهُ عَدُوٌّ لِّى وَعَدُوٌّ لَّهُۥ ۚ وَأَلْقَيْتُ عَلَيْكَ مَحَبَّةً مِّنِّى وَلِتُصْنَعَ عَلَىٰ عَيْنِىٓ

translation.text: and that you may be brought up

translations.text: ‘Put him into a chest, then put it into the river. The river will wash it ashore, and he will be taken by ˹Pharaoh,˺ an enemy of Mine and his.’ And I endeared you with love from Me ˹O Moses˺<sup foot_note=76933>1</sup> so that you would be brought up under My ˹watchful˺ Eye.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ani iqthifeehi fee attabootifaqthifeehi fee alyammi falyulqihi alyammu bissahiliya/khuthhu AAaduwwun lee waAAaduwwun lahu waalqaytuAAalayka mahabbatan minnee walitusnaAAa AAalaAAaynee
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ تَمْشِىٓ أُخْتُكَ فَتَقُولُ هَلْ أَدُلُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن يَكْفُلُهُۥ ۖ فَرَجَعْنَـٰكَ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ كَىْ تَقَرَّ عَيْنُهَا وَلَا تَحْزَنَ ۚ وَقَتَلْتَ نَفْسًا فَنَجَّيْنَـٰكَ مِنَ ٱلْغَمِّ وَفَتَنَّـٰكَ فُتُونًا ۚ فَلَبِثْتَ سِنِينَ فِىٓ أَهْلِ مَدْيَنَ ثُمَّ جِئْتَ عَلَىٰ قَدَرٍ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ

translations.text: ˹Remember˺ when your sister came along and proposed, ‘Shall I direct you to someone who will nurse him?’<sup foot_note=76934>1</sup> So We reunited you with your mother so that her heart would be put at ease, and she would not grieve. ˹Later˺ you killed a man ˹by mistake˺, but We saved you from sorrow, as well as other tests We put you through. Then you stayed for a number of years among the people of Midian. Then you came here as pre-destined, O  Moses!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith tamshee okhtuka fataqoolu haladullukum AAala man yakfuluhu farajaAAnaka ilaommika kay taqarra AAaynuha wala tahzanawaqatalta nafsan fanajjaynaka mina alghammi wafatannakafutoonan falabithta sineena fee ahli madyana thumma ji/ta AAalaqadarin ya moosa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱصْطَنَعْتُكَ لِنَفْسِى

translations.text: And I have selected you for My service.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WastanaAAtuka linafsee
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱذْهَبْ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِى وَلَا تَنِيَا فِى ذِكْرِى

translations.text: Go forth, you and your brother, with My signs and never falter in remembering Me.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ithhab anta waakhooka bi-ayateewala taniya fee thikree
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱذْهَبَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ

translations.text: Go, both of you, to Pharaoh, for he has truly transgressed ˹all bounds˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ithhaba ila firAAawnainnahu tagha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَقُولَا لَهُۥ قَوْلًا لَّيِّنًا لَّعَلَّهُۥ يَتَذَكَّرُ أَوْ يَخْشَىٰ

translations.text: Speak to him gently, so perhaps he may be mindful ˹of Me˺ or fearful ˹of My punishment˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faqoola lahu qawlan layyinanlaAAallahu yatathakkaru aw yakhsha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَا رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَا نَخَافُ أَن يَفْرُطَ عَلَيْنَآ أَوْ أَن يَطْغَىٰ

translations.text: They both pleaded, “Our Lord! We fear that he may be quick to harm us or act tyrannically.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbana innananakhafu an yafruta AAalayna aw an yatgha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآ ۖ إِنَّنِى مَعَكُمَآ أَسْمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ

translations.text: Allah reassured ˹them˺, “Have no fear! I am with you, hearing and seeing.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala la takhafainnanee maAAakuma asmaAAu waara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأْتِيَاهُ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولَا رَبِّكَ فَأَرْسِلْ مَعَنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَلَا تُعَذِّبْهُمْ ۖ قَدْ جِئْنَـٰكَ بِـَٔايَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۖ وَٱلسَّلَـٰمُ عَلَىٰ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ

translations.text: So go to him and say, ‘Indeed we are both messengers from your Lord, so let the Children of Israel go with us, and do not oppress them. We have come to you with a sign from your Lord. And salvation will be for whoever follows the ˹right˺ guidance.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa/tiyahu faqoola innarasoola rabbika faarsil maAAana banee isra-eelawala tuAAaththibhum qad ji/naka bi-ayatinmin rabbika wassalamu AAala mani ittabaAAaalhuda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا قَدْ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْنَآ أَنَّ ٱلْعَذَابَ عَلَىٰ مَن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

translations.text: It has indeed been revealed to us that the punishment will be upon whoever denies ˹the truth˺ and turns away.’”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna qad oohiya ilaynaanna alAAathaba AAala man kaththaba watawalla
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ فَمَن رَّبُّكُمَا يَـٰمُوسَىٰ

translations.text: Pharaoh asked, “Who then is the Lord of you two, O  Moses?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala faman rabbukuma yamoosa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَعْطَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلْقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ

translations.text: He answered, “Our Lord is the One Who has given everything its ˹distinctive˺ form, then guided ˹it˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbuna allatheeaAAta kulla shay-in khalqahu thumma hada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ فَمَا بَالُ ٱلْقُرُونِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ

translations.text: Pharaoh asked, “And what about previous peoples?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala fama balualqurooni al-oola
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ عِلْمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّى فِى كِتَـٰبٍ ۖ لَّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّى وَلَا يَنسَى

translations.text: He replied, “That knowledge is with my Lord in a Record. My Lord neither falters nor forgets ˹anything˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala AAilmuha AAinda rabbeefee kitabin la yadillu rabbee walayansa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ مَهْدًا وَسَلَكَ لَكُمْ فِيهَا سُبُلًا وَأَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًا مِّن نَّبَاتٍ شَتَّىٰ

translations.text: ˹He is the One˺ Who has laid out the earth for ˹all of˺ you, and set in it pathways for you, and sends down rain from the sky, causing various types of plants to grow,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allathee jaAAala lakumu al-ardamahdan wasalaka lakum feeha subulan waanzala mina assama-imaan faakhrajna bihi azwajan min nabatinshatta
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كُلُوا۟ وَٱرْعَوْا۟ أَنْعَـٰمَكُمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلنُّهَىٰ

translations.text: ˹so˺ eat and graze your cattle. Surely in this are signs for people of sound judgment.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kuloo warAAaw anAAamakum innafee thalika laayatin li-olee annuha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ مِنْهَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ وَفِيهَا نُعِيدُكُمْ وَمِنْهَا نُخْرِجُكُمْ تَارَةً أُخْرَىٰ

translations.text: From the earth We created you, and into it We will return you, and from it We will bring you back again.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Minha khalaqnakum wafeehanuAAeedukum waminha nukhrijukum taratan okhra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَرَيْنَـٰهُ ءَايَـٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

translations.text: And We certainly showed Pharaoh all of Our signs,<sup foot_note=76935>1</sup> but he denied them and refused ˹to believe˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad araynahu ayatinakullaha fakaththaba waaba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ أَجِئْتَنَا لِتُخْرِجَنَا مِنْ أَرْضِنَا بِسِحْرِكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ

translations.text: He said, “Have you come to drive us out of our land with your magic, O  Moses?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala aji/tana litukhrijanamin ardina bisihrika ya moosa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّكَ بِسِحْرٍ مِّثْلِهِۦ فَٱجْعَلْ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَكَ مَوْعِدًا لَّا نُخْلِفُهُۥ نَحْنُ وَلَآ أَنتَ مَكَانًا سُوًى

translation.text: Then we will surely produce for you

translations.text: We can surely meet you with similar magic. So set for us an appointment that neither of us will fail to keep, in a central place.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falana/tiyannaka bisihrin mithlihi fajAAalbaynana wabaynaka mawAAidan la nukhlifuhu nahnuwala anta makanan suwa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ مَوْعِدُكُمْ يَوْمُ ٱلزِّينَةِ وَأَن يُحْشَرَ ٱلنَّاسُ ضُحًى

translations.text: Moses said, “Your appointment is on the Day of the Festival, and let the people be gathered mid-morning.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala mawAAidukum yawmu azzeenatiwaan yuhshara annasu duha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَتَوَلَّىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ فَجَمَعَ كَيْدَهُۥ ثُمَّ أَتَىٰ

translations.text: Pharaoh then withdrew, orchestrated his scheme, then returned.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fatawalla firAAawnu fajamaAAa kaydahuthumma ata
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰ وَيْلَكُمْ لَا تَفْتَرُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا فَيُسْحِتَكُم بِعَذَابٍ ۖ وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ

translations.text: Moses warned the magicians, “Woe to you! Do not fabricate a lie against Allah,<sup foot_note=76936>1</sup> or He will wipe you out with a torment. Whoever fabricates ˹lies˺ is bound to fail.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala lahum moosa waylakum lataftaroo AAala Allahi kathiban fayushitakumbiAAathabin waqad khaba mani iftara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَتَنَـٰزَعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ وَأَسَرُّوا۟ ٱلنَّجْوَىٰ

translations.text: So the magicians disputed the matter among themselves, conversing privately.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FatanazaAAoo amrahum baynahumwaasarroo annajwa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَٰنِ لَسَـٰحِرَٰنِ يُرِيدَانِ أَن يُخْرِجَاكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِمَا وَيَذْهَبَا بِطَرِيقَتِكُمُ ٱلْمُثْلَىٰ

translations.text: They concluded, “These two are only magicians who want to drive you out of your land with their magic, and do away with your most cherished traditions.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo in hathani lasahiraniyureedani an yukhrijakum min ardikum bisihrihimawayathhaba bitareeqatikumu almuthla
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَجْمِعُوا۟ كَيْدَكُمْ ثُمَّ ٱئْتُوا۟ صَفًّا ۚ وَقَدْ أَفْلَحَ ٱلْيَوْمَ مَنِ ٱسْتَعْلَىٰ

translations.text: So orchestrate your plan, then come forward in ˹perfect˺ ranks. And whoever prevails today will certainly be successful.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FaajmiAAoo kaydakum thumma i/too saffanwaqad aflaha alyawma mani istaAAla
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلْقِىَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنْ أَلْقَىٰ

translations.text: They said, “O Moses! Either you cast, or let us be the first to cast.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo ya moosa immaan tulqiya wa-imma an nakoona awwala man alqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ بَلْ أَلْقُوا۟ ۖ فَإِذَا حِبَالُهُمْ وَعِصِيُّهُمْ يُخَيَّلُ إِلَيْهِ مِن سِحْرِهِمْ أَنَّهَا تَسْعَىٰ

translations.text: Moses responded, “No, you go first.” And suddenly their ropes and staffs appeared to him—by their magic—to be slithering.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala bal alqoo fa-itha hibaluhumwaAAisiyyuhum yukhayyalu ilayhi min sihrihim annahatasAAa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَوْجَسَ فِى نَفْسِهِۦ خِيفَةً مُّوسَىٰ

translations.text: So Moses concealed fear within himself.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faawjasa fee nafsihi kheefatan moosa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْنَا لَا تَخَفْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ

translations.text: We reassured ˹him˺, “Do not fear! It is certainly you who will prevail.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qulna la takhaf innaka antaal-aAAla
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَلْقِ مَا فِى يَمِينِكَ تَلْقَفْ مَا صَنَعُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّمَا صَنَعُوا۟ كَيْدُ سَـٰحِرٍ ۖ وَلَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلسَّاحِرُ حَيْثُ أَتَىٰ

translations.text: Cast what is in your right hand, and it will swallow up what they have made, for what they have made is no more than a magic trick. And magicians can never succeed wherever they go.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waalqi ma fee yameenika talqaf masanaAAoo innama sanaAAoo kaydu sahirinwala yuflihu assahiru haythuata
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأُلْقِىَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدًا قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَـٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ

translations.text: So the magicians fell down in prostration, declaring, “We believe in the Lord of Aaron and Moses.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faolqiya assaharatu sujjadanqaloo amanna birabbi haroona wamoosa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ ۖ فَلَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ فِى جُذُوعِ ٱلنَّخْلِ وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ أَيُّنَآ أَشَدُّ عَذَابًا وَأَبْقَىٰ

translation.text: So surely I will cut off
and surely I will crucify you

translations.text: Pharaoh threatened, “How dare you believe in him before I give you permission? He must be your master who taught you magic. I will certainly cut off your hands and feet on opposite sides, and crucify you on the trunks of palm trees. You will really see whose punishment is more severe and more lasting.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala amantum lahu qabla an athanalakum innahu lakabeerukumu allathee AAallamakumu assihrafalaoqattiAAanna aydiyakum waarjulakum min khilafinwalaosallibannakum fee juthooAAi annakhliwalataAAlamunna ayyuna ashaddu AAathaban waabqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ لَن نُّؤْثِرَكَ عَلَىٰ مَا جَآءَنَا مِنَ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ وَٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنَا ۖ فَٱقْضِ مَآ أَنتَ قَاضٍ ۖ إِنَّمَا تَقْضِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَآ

translations.text: They responded, “By the One Who created us! We will never prefer you over the clear proofs that have come to us. So do whatever you want! Your authority only covers the ˹fleeting˺ life of this world.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo lan nu/thiraka AAala majaana mina albayyinati wallatheefatarana faqdi ma anta qadininnama taqdee hathihi alhayataaddunya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّآ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّنَا لِيَغْفِرَ لَنَا خَطَـٰيَـٰنَا وَمَآ أَكْرَهْتَنَا عَلَيْهِ مِنَ ٱلسِّحْرِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ

translations.text: Indeed, we have believed in our Lord so He may forgive our sins and that magic you have forced us to practice. And Allah is far superior ˹in reward˺ and more lasting ˹in punishment˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna amanna birabbinaliyaghfira lana khatayana wamaakrahtana AAalayhi mina assihri wallahukhayrun waabqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّهُۥ مَن يَأْتِ رَبَّهُۥ مُجْرِمًا فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ

translations.text: Whoever comes to their Lord as an evildoer will certainly have Hell, where they can neither live nor die.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahu man ya/ti rabbahu mujriman fa-innalahu jahannama la yamootu feeha wala yahya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَن يَأْتِهِۦ مُؤْمِنًا قَدْ عَمِلَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلدَّرَجَـٰتُ ٱلْعُلَىٰ

translations.text: But whoever comes to Him as a believer, having done good, they will have the highest ranks:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waman ya/tihi mu/minan qad AAamila assalihatifaola-ika lahumu addarajatu alAAula
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ

translations.text: the Gardens of Eternity, under which rivers flow, where they will stay forever. That is the reward of those who purify themselves.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Jannatu AAadnin tajree min tahtihaal-anharu khalideena feeha wathalikajazao man tazakka
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِى فَٱضْرِبْ لَهُمْ طَرِيقًا فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ يَبَسًا لَّا تَخَـٰفُ دَرَكًا وَلَا تَخْشَىٰ

translations.text: And We surely inspired Moses, ˹saying,˺ “Leave with My servants ˹at night˺ and strike a dry passage for them across the sea. Have no fear of being overtaken, nor be concerned ˹of drowning˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad awhayna ilamoosa an asri biAAibadee fadriblahum tareeqan fee albahri yabasan la takhafudarakan wala takhsha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَتْبَعَهُمْ فِرْعَوْنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمْ

translations.text: Then Pharaoh pursued them with his soldiers—but how overwhelming were the waters that submerged them!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FaatbaAAahum firAAawnu bijunoodihifaghashiyahum mina alyammi ma ghashiyahum
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَضَلَّ فِرْعَوْنُ قَوْمَهُۥ وَمَا هَدَىٰ

translations.text: And ˹so˺ Pharaoh led his people astray, and did not guide ˹them rightly˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waadalla firAAawnu qawmahu wamahada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ قَدْ أَنجَيْنَـٰكُم مِّنْ عَدُوِّكُمْ وَوَٰعَدْنَـٰكُمْ جَانِبَ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلْأَيْمَنَ وَنَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْمَنَّ وَٱلسَّلْوَىٰ

translation.text: and We made a covenant with you

translations.text: O Children of Israel! We saved you from your enemy, and made an appointment with you<sup foot_note=76937>1</sup> on the right side of Mount Ṭûr, and sent down to you manna and quails,<sup foot_note=76938>2</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya banee isra-eela qad anjaynakummin AAaduwwikum wawaAAadnakum janiba attoorial-aymana wanazzalna AAalaykumu almanna wassalwa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كُلُوا۟ مِن طَيِّبَـٰتِ مَا رَزَقْنَـٰكُمْ وَلَا تَطْغَوْا۟ فِيهِ فَيَحِلَّ عَلَيْكُمْ غَضَبِى ۖ وَمَن يَحْلِلْ عَلَيْهِ غَضَبِى فَقَدْ هَوَىٰ

translations.text: ˹saying,˺ “Eat from the good things We have provided for you, but do not transgress in them, or My wrath will befall you. And whoever My wrath befalls is certainly doomed.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kuloo min tayyibati marazaqnakum wala tatghaw feehi fayahillaAAalaykum ghadabee waman yahlil AAalayhi ghadabeefaqad hawa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنِّى لَغَفَّارٌ لِّمَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا ثُمَّ ٱهْتَدَىٰ

translations.text: But I am truly Most Forgiving to whoever repents, believes, and does good, then persists on ˹true˺ guidance.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innee laghaffarun liman tabawaamana waAAamila salihan thumma ihtada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَمَآ أَعْجَلَكَ عَن قَوْمِكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ

translations.text: ˹Allah asked,˺ “Why have you come with such haste ahead of your people, O  Moses?”<sup foot_note=76939>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama aAAjalaka AAan qawmika yamoosa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ هُمْ أُو۟لَآءِ عَلَىٰٓ أَثَرِى وَعَجِلْتُ إِلَيْكَ رَبِّ لِتَرْضَىٰ

translations.text: He replied, “They are close on my tracks. And I have hastened to You, my Lord, so You will be pleased.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala hum ola-i AAalaatharee waAAajiltu ilayka rabbi litarda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ فَإِنَّا قَدْ فَتَنَّا قَوْمَكَ مِنۢ بَعْدِكَ وَأَضَلَّهُمُ ٱلسَّامِرِىُّ

translations.text: Allah responded, “We have indeed tested your people in your absence, and the Sâmiri<sup foot_note=76940>1</sup> has led them astray.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala fa-inna qad fatannaqawmaka min baAAdika waadallahumu assamiriy
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَرَجَعَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ غَضْبَـٰنَ أَسِفًا ۚ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ أَلَمْ يَعِدْكُمْ رَبُّكُمْ وَعْدًا حَسَنًا ۚ أَفَطَالَ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْعَهْدُ أَمْ أَرَدتُّمْ أَن يَحِلَّ عَلَيْكُمْ غَضَبٌ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ فَأَخْلَفْتُم مَّوْعِدِى

translations.text: So Moses returned to his people, furious and sorrowful. He said, “O my people! Had your Lord not made you a good promise?<sup foot_note=76941>1</sup> Has my absence been too long for you? Or have you wished for wrath from your Lord to befall you, so you broke your promise to me?”<sup foot_note=76942>2</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FarajaAAa moosa ila qawmihighadbana asifan qala ya qawmi alamyaAAidkum rabbukum waAAdan hasanan afatalaAAalaykumu alAAahdu am aradtum an yahilla AAalaykum ghadabunmin rabbikum faakhlaftum mawAAidee
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَخْلَفْنَا مَوْعِدَكَ بِمَلْكِنَا وَلَـٰكِنَّا حُمِّلْنَآ أَوْزَارًا مِّن زِينَةِ ٱلْقَوْمِ فَقَذَفْنَـٰهَا فَكَذَٰلِكَ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّامِرِىُّ

translations.text: They argued, “We did not break our promise to you of our own free will, but we were made to carry the burden of the people’s ˹golden˺ jewellery,<sup foot_note=76943>1</sup> then we threw it ˹into the fire˺, and so did the Sâmiri.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo ma akhlafnamawAAidaka bimalkina walakinna hummilnaawzaran min zeenati alqawmi faqathafnahafakathalika alqa assamiriy
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَخْرَجَ لَهُمْ عِجْلًا جَسَدًا لَّهُۥ خُوَارٌ فَقَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمْ وَإِلَـٰهُ مُوسَىٰ فَنَسِىَ

translations.text: Then he moulded for them an idol of a calf that made a lowing sound. They said, “This is your god and the god of Moses, but Moses forgot ˹where it was˺!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faakhraja lahum AAijlan jasadan lahu khuwarunfaqaloo hatha ilahukum wa-ilahu moosafanasiy
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَلَا يَرَوْنَ أَلَّا يَرْجِعُ إِلَيْهِمْ قَوْلًا وَلَا يَمْلِكُ لَهُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا نَفْعًا

translations.text: Did they not see that it did not respond to them, nor could it protect or benefit them?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afala yarawna alla yarjiAAuilayhim qawlan wala yamliku lahum darran walanafAAa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ قَالَ لَهُمْ هَـٰرُونُ مِن قَبْلُ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنَّمَا فُتِنتُم بِهِۦ ۖ وَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ فَٱتَّبِعُونِى وَأَطِيعُوٓا۟ أَمْرِى

translations.text: Aaron had already warned them beforehand, “O my people! You are only being tested by this, for indeed your ˹one true˺ Lord is the Most Compassionate. So follow me and obey my orders.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad qala lahum haroonu minqablu ya qawmi innama futintum bihi wa-innarabbakumu arrahmanu fattabiAAooneewaateeAAoo amree
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ لَن نَّبْرَحَ عَلَيْهِ عَـٰكِفِينَ حَتَّىٰ يَرْجِعَ إِلَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ

translations.text: They replied, “We will not cease to worship it until Moses returns to us.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo lan nabraha AAalayhi AAakifeenahatta yarjiAAa ilayna moosa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ يَـٰهَـٰرُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذْ رَأَيْتَهُمْ ضَلُّوٓا۟

translations.text: Moses scolded ˹his brother˺, “O Aaron! What prevented you, when you saw them going astray,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala ya haroonu mamanaAAaka ith raaytahum dalloo
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَّا تَتَّبِعَنِ ۖ أَفَعَصَيْتَ أَمْرِى

translations.text: from following after me? How could you disobey my orders?”<sup foot_note=76944>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alla tattabiAAani afaAAasaytaamree
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ يَبْنَؤُمَّ لَا تَأْخُذْ بِلِحْيَتِى وَلَا بِرَأْسِىٓ ۖ إِنِّى خَشِيتُ أَن تَقُولَ فَرَّقْتَ بَيْنَ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَلَمْ تَرْقُبْ قَوْلِى

translations.text: Aaron pleaded, “O son of my mother! Do not seize me by my beard or ˹the hair of˺ my head. I really feared that you would say, ‘You have caused division among the Children of Israel, and did not observe my word.’”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala yabnaomma la ta/khuthbilihyatee wala bira/see innee khasheetu an taqoolafarraqta bayna banee isra-eela walam tarqub qawlee
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكَ يَـٰسَـٰمِرِىُّ

translations.text: Moses then asked, “What did you think you were doing, O  Sâmiri?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala fama khatbuka yasamiriy
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ بَصُرْتُ بِمَا لَمْ يَبْصُرُوا۟ بِهِۦ فَقَبَضْتُ قَبْضَةً مِّنْ أَثَرِ ٱلرَّسُولِ فَنَبَذْتُهَا وَكَذَٰلِكَ سَوَّلَتْ لِى نَفْسِى

translations.text: He said, “I saw what they did not see, so I took a handful ˹of dust˺ from the hoof-prints of ˹the horse of˺ the messenger-angel ˹Gabriel˺ then cast it ˹on the moulded calf˺. This is what my lower-self tempted me into.”<sup foot_note=76945>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala basurtu bima lamyabsuroo bihi faqabadtu qabdatan min athariarrasooli fanabathtuha wakathalikasawwalat lee nafsee
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ فَٱذْهَبْ فَإِنَّ لَكَ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ أَن تَقُولَ لَا مِسَاسَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَكَ مَوْعِدًا لَّن تُخْلَفَهُۥ ۖ وَٱنظُرْ إِلَىٰٓ إِلَـٰهِكَ ٱلَّذِى ظَلْتَ عَلَيْهِ عَاكِفًا ۖ لَّنُحَرِّقَنَّهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَنسِفَنَّهُۥ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ نَسْفًا

translations.text: Moses said, “Go away then! And for ˹the rest of your˺ life you will surely be crying, ‘Do not touch ˹me˺!’<sup foot_note=76946>1</sup> Then you will certainly have a fate<sup foot_note=76947>2</sup> that you cannot escape. Now look at your god to which you have been devoted: we will burn it up, then scatter it in the sea completely.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala fathhab fa-innalaka fee alhayati an taqoola la misasawa-inna laka mawAAidan lan tukhlafahu wanthurila ilahika allathee thaltaAAalayhi AAakifan lanuharriqannahu thummalanansifannahu fee alyammi nasfa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّمَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عِلْمًا

translations.text: ˹Then Moses addressed his people,˺ “Your only god is Allah, there is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. He encompasses everything in ˹His˺ knowledge.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innama ilahukumu Allahuallathee la ilaha illa huwa wasiAAakulla shay-in AAilma
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَذَٰلِكَ نَقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ مَا قَدْ سَبَقَ ۚ وَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَـٰكَ مِن لَّدُنَّا ذِكْرًا

translations.text: This is how We relate to you ˹O Prophet˺ some of the stories of the past. And We have certainly granted you a Reminder<sup foot_note=76948>1</sup> from Us.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kathalika naqussu AAalayka minanba-i ma qad sabaqa waqad ataynakamin ladunna thikra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَّنْ أَعْرَضَ عَنْهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَحْمِلُ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وِزْرًا

translations.text: Whoever turns away from it will surely bear the burden ˹of sin˺ on the Day of Judgment,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Man aAArada AAanhu fa-innahu yahmiluyawma alqiyamati wizra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهِ ۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ حِمْلًا

translations.text: suffering its consequences forever. What an evil burden they will carry on Judgment Day!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Khalideena feehi wasaa lahumyawma alqiyamati himla
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ وَنَحْشُرُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ يَوْمَئِذٍ زُرْقًا

translations.text: ˹Beware of˺ the Day the Trumpet will be blown,<sup foot_note=76949>1</sup> and We will gather the wicked on that Day blue-faced ˹from horror and thirst˺.<sup foot_note=76950>2</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma yunfakhu fee assooriwanahshuru almujrimeena yawma-ithin zurqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَتَخَـٰفَتُونَ بَيْنَهُمْ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا عَشْرًا

translations.text: They will whisper among themselves, “You stayed no more than ten days ˹on the earth˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yatakhafatoona baynahum in labithtumilla AAashra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ إِذْ يَقُولُ أَمْثَلُهُمْ طَرِيقَةً إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا يَوْمًا

translations.text: We know best what they will say—the most reasonable of them will say, “You stayed no more than a day.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Nahnu aAAlamu bima yaqooloonaith yaqoolu amthaluhum tareeqatan in labithtum illayawma
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلْجِبَالِ فَقُلْ يَنسِفُهَا رَبِّى نَسْفًا

translations.text: And ˹if˺ they ask you ˹O Prophet˺ about the mountains, ˹then˺ say, “My Lord will wipe them out completely,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayas-aloonaka AAani aljibali faqulyansifuha rabbee nasfa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَيَذَرُهَا قَاعًا صَفْصَفًا

translations.text: leaving the earth level and bare,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fayatharuha qaAAan safsafa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّا تَرَىٰ فِيهَا عِوَجًا وَلَآ أَمْتًا

translations.text: with neither depressions nor elevations to be seen.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La tara feeha AAiwajanwala amta
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلدَّاعِىَ لَا عِوَجَ لَهُۥ ۖ وَخَشَعَتِ ٱلْأَصْوَاتُ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ فَلَا تَسْمَعُ إِلَّا هَمْسًا

translations.text: On that Day all will follow the caller ˹for assembly˺, ˹and˺ none will dare to deviate. All voices will be hushed before the Most Compassionate. Only whispers<sup foot_note=76951>1</sup> will be heard.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma-ithin yattabiAAoona addaAAiyala AAiwaja lahu wakhashaAAati al-aswatu lirrahmanifala tasmaAAu illa hamsa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةُ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَرَضِىَ لَهُۥ قَوْلًا

translations.text: On that Day no intercession will be of any benefit, except by those granted permission by the Most Compassionate and whose words are agreeable to Him.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma-ithin la tanfaAAu ashshafaAAatuilla man athina lahu arrahmanuwaradiya lahu qawla
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِهِۦ عِلْمًا

translations.text: He ˹fully˺ knows what is ahead of them and what is behind them,<sup foot_note=76952>1</sup> but they cannot encompass Him in ˹their˺ knowledge.<sup foot_note=76953>2</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: YaAAlamu ma bayna aydeehim wamakhalfahum wala yuheetoona bihi AAilma
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَعَنَتِ ٱلْوُجُوهُ لِلْحَىِّ ٱلْقَيُّومِ ۖ وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنْ حَمَلَ ظُلْمًا

translations.text: And all faces will be humbled before the Ever-Living, All-Sustaining. And those burdened with wrongdoing will be in loss.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WaAAanati alwujoohu lilhayyialqayyoomi waqad khaba man hamala thulma
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَلَا يَخَافُ ظُلْمًا وَلَا هَضْمًا

translations.text: But whoever does good and is a believer will have no fear of being wronged or denied ˹their reward˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waman yaAAmal mina assalihatiwahuwa mu/minun fala yakhafu thulmanwala hadma
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ قُرْءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا وَصَرَّفْنَا فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلْوَعِيدِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ أَوْ يُحْدِثُ لَهُمْ ذِكْرًا

translations.text: And so We have sent it down as an Arabic Quran and varied the warnings in it, so perhaps they will shun evil or it may cause them to be mindful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakathalika anzalnahu qur-ananAAarabiyyan wasarrafna feehi mina alwaAAeedilaAAallahum yattaqoona aw yuhdithu lahum thikra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۗ وَلَا تَعْجَلْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يُقْضَىٰٓ إِلَيْكَ وَحْيُهُۥ ۖ وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدْنِى عِلْمًا

translations.text: Exalted is Allah, the True King! Do not rush to recite ˹a revelation of˺ the Quran ˹O Prophet˺ before it is ˹properly˺ conveyed to you,<sup foot_note=76954>1</sup> and pray, “My Lord! Increase me in knowledge.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FataAAala Allahualmaliku alhaqqu wala taAAjal bilqur-animin qabli an yuqda ilayka wahyuhu waqul rabbizidnee AAilma
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ عَهِدْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ مِن قَبْلُ فَنَسِىَ وَلَمْ نَجِدْ لَهُۥ عَزْمًا

translations.text: And indeed, We once made a covenant with Adam, but he forgot, and ˹so˺ We did not find determination in him.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad AAahidna ila adamamin qablu fanasiya walam najid lahu AAazma
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذْ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِـَٔادَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰ

translations.text: And ˹remember˺ when We said to the angels, “Prostrate before Adam,” so they all did—but not Iblîs,<sup foot_note=76955>1</sup> who refused ˹arrogantly˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-ith qulna lilmala-ikatiosjudoo li-adama fasajadoo illa ibleesa aba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَقُلْنَا يَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا عَدُوٌّ لَّكَ وَلِزَوْجِكَ فَلَا يُخْرِجَنَّكُمَا مِنَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ فَتَشْقَىٰٓ

translations.text: So We cautioned, “O Adam! This is surely an enemy to you and to your wife. So do not let him drive you both out of Paradise, for you ˹O Adam˺ would then suffer ˹hardship˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faqulna ya adamu innahatha AAaduwwun laka walizawjika falayukhrijannakuma mina aljannati fatashqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ لَكَ أَلَّا تَجُوعَ فِيهَا وَلَا تَعْرَىٰ

translations.text: Here it is guaranteed that you will never go hungry or unclothed,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna laka alla tajooAAa feehawala taAAra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظْمَؤُا۟ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضْحَىٰ

translations.text: nor will you ˹ever˺ suffer from thirst or ˹the sun’s˺ heat.”<sup foot_note=76956>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waannaka la tathmaofeeha wala tadha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَوَسْوَسَ إِلَيْهِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ قَالَ يَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ هَلْ أَدُلُّكَ عَلَىٰ شَجَرَةِ ٱلْخُلْدِ وَمُلْكٍ لَّا يَبْلَىٰ

translations.text: But Satan whispered to him, saying, “O Adam! Shall I show you the Tree of Immortality and a kingdom that does not fade away?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fawaswasa ilayhi ashshaytanuqala ya adamu hal adulluka AAalashajarati alkhuldi wamulkin la yabla
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَكَلَا مِنْهَا فَبَدَتْ لَهُمَا سَوْءَٰتُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخْصِفَانِ عَلَيْهِمَا مِن وَرَقِ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ۚ وَعَصَىٰٓ ءَادَمُ رَبَّهُۥ فَغَوَىٰ

translations.text: So they both ate from the tree and then their nakedness was exposed to them, prompting them to cover themselves with leaves from Paradise. So Adam disobeyed his Lord, and ˹so˺ lost his way.<sup foot_note=76957>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faakala minha fabadat lahumasaw-atuhuma watafiqa yakhsifaniAAalayhima min waraqi aljannati waAAasa adamurabbahu faghawa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ ٱجْتَبَـٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيْهِ وَهَدَىٰ

translations.text: Then his Lord chose him ˹for His grace˺, accepted his repentance, and guided him ˹rightly˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma ijtabahu rabbuhu fatabaAAalayhi wahada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ ٱهْبِطَا مِنْهَا جَمِيعًۢا ۖ بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّ ۖ فَإِمَّا يَأْتِيَنَّكُم مِّنِّى هُدًى فَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ هُدَاىَ فَلَا يَضِلُّ وَلَا يَشْقَىٰ

translations.text: Allah said, “Descend, both of you, from here together ˹with Satan˺ as enemies to each other. Then when guidance comes to you from Me, whoever follows My guidance will neither go astray ˹in this life˺ nor suffer ˹in the next˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala ihbita minhajameeAAan baAAdukum libaAAdin AAaduwwun fa-immaya/tiyannakum minnee hudan famani ittabaAAa hudaya falayadillu wala yashqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَنْ أَعْرَضَ عَن ذِكْرِى فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ مَعِيشَةً ضَنكًا وَنَحْشُرُهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ أَعْمَىٰ

translations.text: But whoever turns away from My Reminder will certainly have a miserable life,<sup foot_note=76958>1</sup> then We will raise them up blind on the Day of Judgment.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waman aAArada AAan thikreefa-inna lahu maAAeeshatan danka wanahshuruhuyawma alqiyamati aAAma
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرْتَنِىٓ أَعْمَىٰ وَقَدْ كُنتُ بَصِيرًا

translations.text: They will cry, “My Lord! Why have you raised me up blind, although I used to see?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbi lima hashartaneeaAAma waqad kuntu baseera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ أَتَتْكَ ءَايَـٰتُنَا فَنَسِيتَهَا ۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ تُنسَىٰ

translations.text: Allah will respond, “It is so, just as Our revelations came to you and you neglected them, so Today you are neglected.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala kathalika atatka ayatunafanaseetaha wakathalika alyawma tunsa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى مَنْ أَسْرَفَ وَلَمْ يُؤْمِنۢ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِۦ ۚ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَشَدُّ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ

translations.text: This is how We reward whoever transgresses and does not believe in the revelations of their Lord. And the punishment of the Hereafter is far more severe and more lasting.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakathalika najzee man asrafa walamyu/min bi-ayati rabbihi walaAAathabu al-akhiratiashaddu waabqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَلَمْ يَهْدِ لَهُمْ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ يَمْشُونَ فِى مَسَـٰكِنِهِمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلنُّهَىٰ

translations.text: Is it not yet clear to them how many peoples We destroyed before them, whose ruins they still pass by? Surely in this are signs for people of sound judgment.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknaqablahum mina alqurooni yamshoona fee masakinihim inna feethalika laayatin li-olee annuha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوْلَا كَلِمَةٌ سَبَقَتْ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَكَانَ لِزَامًا وَأَجَلٌ مُّسَمًّى

translations.text: Had it not been for a prior decree from your Lord<sup foot_note=76959>1</sup> ˹O Prophet˺ and a term already set, their ˹instant˺ doom would have been inevitable.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walawla kalimatun sabaqat minrabbika lakana lizaman waajalun musamma
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ غُرُوبِهَا ۖ وَمِنْ ءَانَآئِ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْ وَأَطْرَافَ ٱلنَّهَارِ لَعَلَّكَ تَرْضَىٰ

translations.text: So be patient ˹O Prophet˺ with what they say. And glorify the praises of your Lord before sunrise and before sunset, and glorify Him in the hours of the night and at both ends of the day,<sup foot_note=76960>1</sup> so that you may be pleased ˹with the reward˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fasbir AAala mayaqooloona wasabbih bihamdi rabbika qabla tulooAAiashshamsi waqabla ghuroobiha wamin ana-iallayli fasabbih waatrafa annaharilaAAallaka tarda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيْنَيْكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًا مِّنْهُمْ زَهْرَةَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا لِنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَرِزْقُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ

translations.text: Do not let your eyes crave what We have allowed some of the disbelievers to enjoy; the ˹fleeting˺ splendour of this worldly life, which We test them with. But your Lord’s provision ˹in the Hereafter˺ is far better and more lasting.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala tamuddanna AAaynayka ilama mattaAAna bihi azwajan minhum zahrata alhayatiaddunya linaftinahum feehi warizqu rabbika khayrunwaabqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأْمُرْ أَهْلَكَ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱصْطَبِرْ عَلَيْهَا ۖ لَا نَسْـَٔلُكَ رِزْقًا ۖ نَّحْنُ نَرْزُقُكَ ۗ وَٱلْعَـٰقِبَةُ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ

translations.text: Bid your people to pray, and be diligent in ˹observing˺ it. We do not ask you to provide. It is We Who provide for you. And the ultimate outcome is ˹only˺ for ˹the people of˺ righteousness.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa/mur ahlaka bissalatiwastabir AAalayha la nas-alukarizqan nahnu narzuquka walAAaqibatu littaqwa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْلَا يَأْتِينَا بِـَٔايَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦٓ ۚ أَوَلَمْ تَأْتِهِم بَيِّنَةُ مَا فِى ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ

translations.text: They demand, “If only he could bring us a sign from his Lord!”<sup foot_note=76961>1</sup> Have they not ˹already˺ received a confirmation of what is in earlier Scriptures?<sup foot_note=76962>2</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqaloo lawla ya/teenabi-ayatin min rabbihi awa lam ta/tihim bayyinatu mafee assuhufi al-oola
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوْ أَنَّآ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهُم بِعَذَابٍ مِّن قَبْلِهِۦ لَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا لَوْلَآ أَرْسَلْتَ إِلَيْنَا رَسُولًا فَنَتَّبِعَ ءَايَـٰتِكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن نَّذِلَّ وَنَخْزَىٰ

translations.text: Had We destroyed them with a torment before this ˹Prophet came˺, they would have surely argued, “Our Lord! If only You had sent us a messenger, we would have followed Your revelations before being humiliated and put to shame.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaw anna ahlaknahum biAAathabinmin qablihi laqaloo rabbana lawla arsaltailayna rasoolan fanattabiAAa ayatika minqabli an nathilla wanakhza
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ كُلٌّ مُّتَرَبِّصٌ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ ٱلسَّوِىِّ وَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ

translations.text: Say ˹to them, O  Prophet˺, “Each ˹of us˺ is waiting, so keep waiting! You will soon know who is on the Straight Path and is ˹rightly˺ guided.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul kullun mutarabbisun fatarabbasoofasataAAlamoona man as-habu assiratiassawiyyi wamani ihtada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
